translations.translation: What ails you that you judge in such a wise?
What is the matter with you that you make such strange judgements?
Woe to you! How terrible is your Judgment.
“What is the matter with you? What sort of a judgement you impose!”
What is the matter with you How do you decide
What is the matter with you, how is it that you judge?
What ails you then, how you judge?
What aileth you? How judge ye?
What is the matter with you? How do you form your judgement?
What aileth you? How judge ye?
What is the matter with you? How do you judge?
What is the matter with you? How judge ye?
What is the matter with you? How do you decide?
What is the matter with you? How do you judge?
What is the matter with you? How do you judge?
What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?
[37:154] What is wrong with you? How do you judge?, [how do you make] such a depraved judgement?
What aileth you? How judge ye?) evil is what you choose for yourselves; you choose for Allah what you would not accept for yourselves,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { مَا لَكُمْ } وما شأنكم ولحق بكم أيها المفسدون المفرطون { كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ } [الصافات: 154] على الله ما لا يرتضيه العقل، ولا يقتضيه النقل؟!
